entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: An X-Wing with vital information for Admiral Ackbar was able to launch into space thanks to your help.
entries.journal_entry_description: Provide cover for an X-Wing that needs to take off. It must get to Dantooine with information for Admiral Ackbar.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: General Dodonna must get some vital information to Admiral Ackbar on Dantooine. The only secure means he has left is to send a pilot in an X-Wing to make a hand delivery. In order to help ensure the safety of that pilot, you are going to protect a decoy long enough to allow the true X-Wing to launch..
entries.task00_start_message: You let the X-Wing pilot know to begin.
entries.task00_utterance_wave_1: Shut down that starship immediately and stand down. That means you as well, %TO.
entries.task00_utterance_wave_2: Failure to comply with Imperial directives will be met with the full force of the Empire.
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Good work! I'm underway and should be able to get to Dantooine safely. Thanks!
